map.title: Find Us
map.description: Located in the beautiful city of Elbasan, Panorama Resort offers easy access to local attractions while providing a peaceful retreat from the bustle of everyday life.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to our most commonly asked questions. If you don't see what you're looking for, please contact us.

questions.question: What are the check-in and check-out times?
questions.answer: Check-in is from 3:00 PM and check-out is until 11:00 AM. Early check-in and late check-out may be possible depending on availability â€” just let us know in advance.

questions.question: Is Wi-Fi available at the resort?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer free high-speed Wi-Fi throughout the entire resort, including all rooms and public areas.

questions.question: Is horse riding available at the resort?
questions.answer: Yes! Horse riding is available right inside the resort in our dedicated area. It's suitable for all ages and experience levels.

questions.question: Do you have a swimming pool open year-round?
questions.answer: Yes, we have both an outdoor summer pool and a heated indoor pool that is open year-round. There's also a sauna for extra relaxation.

questions.question: Can I enjoy traditional Albanian food at the resort?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Our restaurant offers a range of traditional Albanian dishes prepared with fresh, local ingredients.

questions.question: Is there live entertainment at the resort?
questions.answer: We occasionally host evenings with live traditional music to offer guests a taste of Albanian culture in a warm, welcoming atmosphere.

questions.question: Is the resort suitable for families?
questions.answer: Yes, Panorama Resort is family-friendly. We offer family rooms, a children's area in the pool, and safe outdoor spaces for kids to enjoy.

questions.question: Are pets allowed?
questions.answer: We currently do not accommodate pets at the resort.

questions.question: Do you offer free parking?
questions.answer: Yes, private parking is available free of charge for all guests.

questions.question: Do you offer any seasonal packages or promotions?
questions.answer: Yes! We regularly offer seasonal deals. Please check our website or contact our team for the latest packages.
